Package com.composum.chatgpt.base.service.chat

Interface GPTChatCompletionService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GPTChatCompletionServiceImpl
    public interface GPTChatCompletionService
    Raw abstraction of the ChatGPT chat interface, with only the details that are needed.

    This does deliberately not use the OpenAI API classes because we want to be able to switch to a different API implementation, and hide their complexity from the rest of the code. If we need special parameters, we will add new methods with more specific function.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      String getSingleChatCompletion​(GPTChatRequest request)
      The simplest case: give some messages and get a single response.
      GPTChatMessagesTemplate getTemplate​(String templateName)
      Retrieves a (usually cached) chat template with that name.
      String shorten​(String text, int maxwords)
      Helper method to shorten texts by taking out the middle if too long.

    • Method Detail

      • getSingleChatCompletion

        String getSingleChatCompletion​(GPTChatRequest request)
                        throws GPTException
        The simplest case: give some messages and get a single response.
        Throws:
        GPTException

      • getTemplate

        @Nonnull
GPTChatMessagesTemplate getTemplate​(@Nonnull
                                    String templateName)
                             throws GPTException
        Retrieves a (usually cached) chat template with that name. Mostly for backend internal use. The templates are retrieved from the bundle resources at "chattemplates/", and are cached.
        Parameters:
        templateName - the name of the template to retrieve, e.g. "singleTranslation" .
        Throws:
        GPTException

      • shorten

        @Nonnull
String shorten​(@Nullable
               String text,
               int maxwords)
        throws GPTException
        Helper method to shorten texts by taking out the middle if too long. In texts longer than this many words we replace the middle with ... since ChatGPT can only process a limited number of words / tokens and in the introduction or summary there is probably the most information about the text. The output has then maxwords words, including the ... marker.
        Parameters:
        text - the text to shorten
        maxwords - the maximum number of words in the output
        Throws:
        GPTException
